thread.section_title: Lyft Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lyft | www.lyft.com | 8 of 104
thread.title: A Driver

author: A Driver
title: A Driver
text:
This is the second time I've been rip off from LYFT...I OPT in for their guarantee rate at 2-3, 3-4, 4-5 I drove within those hours and when I look at the HISTORY...they had me down as starting at 11:00 so that I would not qualify for the guarantee rate
My acceptance rate was 100% untill the next t the last ride which was about a little after 5 when I got some very nasty rude and very over rate customer got in my car...they begin to fight and start spraying my car with their perfume
So lyft is not paying me my guarantee rate, that I earn within the time period and had an100 % acceptance rate until the trouble riders got in my car and destroyed my back seat
I do not see LYFT and Uber in the future as they have many complaints while the CEO get rich cheating their drivers and others that work for them
